name: Knit
instructions: Knit one

name: Purl
instructions: Purl one

name: Yarn over
instructions: Pass yarn over the right needle.

name: Cast on
instructions: Make a slip knot. Slide slip knot onto needle. Pull yarn to tighten knot. Wrap the working yarn around your thumb so you have a loop around your thumb. Bring the needle under and up through the loop around your thumb. Remove your thumb from the loop and pull the yarn.

name: Bind off
instructions: Insert the tip of the left needle into the front of the right-hand st on the right needle. Lift up and over the left-hand st. Allow st on the left needle to drop off the needle, leaving just one stitch on the right needle.

name: Knit two together
instructions: With yarn at back, enter your right needle into the first two stitches in your left needle, from left to right, and knit both at the same time.

name: Purl two together
instructions: With yarn at front, enter your right needle into the first two stitches in your left needle, from right to left, and purl both at the same time.

name: Slip slip knit
instructions: Slip first and second sts onto the right needle. Pass to left needle. K1. Pass slipped st over last st.

name: Slip slip purl
instructions: Slip first and second sts onto the right needle. Pass to left needle. P1. Pass slipped st over last st.

name: Knit through back loop
instructions: Insert right needle from right to left in back of st. YO clockwise and pull through.

name: Purl through back loop
instructions: Wyif,insert right needle from left to right in back of st. YO counter-clockwise and pull through.

name: Make one
instructions: From the front, pick up strand between two sts and lift to left needle. Insert right needle tfl. Yarn is in front of work. YO and pull through.

name: Make one purlwise
instructions: From the front, pick up strand between two sts and lift to left needle. Insert right needle tbl. Yarn is in front of work. YO and pull through.

name: Make bobble
instructions: Knit into desired st without dropping the loop off the left needle. Knit same st through back loop, then through front loop.

name: Nupp
instructions: Loosely *K1, without slipping the stitch off the needle YO*. Repeat from * to * 2 more times. K1. Insert left needle through all 7 sts. YO and pull through.

name: Knit stitch in row below
instructions: Insert needle into loop below the first stitch on left needle. Wrap yarn around needle counter-clockwise. Pull yarn through towards the front. Drop stitch off left needle.

name: Purl stitch in row below
instructions: Bring yarn to front and enter loop below next purl stitch from behind. Wrap yarn around needle counter-clockwise. Pull yarn through. Drop resulting stitch off left needle.

name: Knit front and back
instructions: K1 without slipping to right needle. Insert needle into back loop of same st from right to left. YO, pull yarn through and drop st.

name: Knit, yarn over, knit
instructions: K1 without dropping st from left needle. YO. K1 into same st.

name: Purl, yarn over, purl
instructions: P1 without dropping st from left needle. YO. P1 into same st.

name: Slip, slip, knit, pass
instructions: Slip 2 sts tog. K1. Pass slipped sts over.

name: Slip, slip, slip, knit
instructions: Slip 3 sts knitwise. Pass to left needle and K3tog.

name: Twisted slip, slip, knit
instructions: Slip 1 purlwise. Slip 1 knitwise. Pass 2 slipped sts to left needle and K2tog tbl.

name: Twisted knit two together
instructions: Slip 1 purlwise tfl and 1 purlwise tbl. Pass 2 slipped sts to left needle and K2tog.
